title: The Semiconductor Supply Chain - Issue Brief
summary: Issue brief outlining complexity of semiconductor supply chains and national security relevance.

extracted_claims.claim_text: Complex supply chains underpin advanced chips critical to national security.

title: A Growing Yard: China export controls are ensnaring CPUs
summary: Discusses expansion of U.S. export controls affecting advanced chips and downstream ecosystem.

extracted_claims.claim_text: Export controls are expanding in scope and can create compliance and supply risk.

title: Semiconductor Supply Chains, AI and Economic Statecraft
summary: Framework linking semiconductors, AI, and economic security/statecraft dynamics.

extracted_claims.claim_text: Semiconductor supply chains are a lever of economic statecraft in AI competition.
